name: Quadcopters War
description:
I am pleased to present my game - Quadcopters War

You can play it by downloading from 🎮 Google Play

There are no third-party ads in the game (except for a rare support me in the boosty). So there's nothing stopping you from enjoying this game!

Along with this I made the game completely open source! I give you every right to use this project for any of your purposes (from personal to commercial). The source code is on Github

If you have any questions for me - you can ask them here in the comments or on my Discord server

❤
